post.author: 임기순
post.content:
This is further to your resume sent to us for a suitable position. I am looking for a suitable consultant for below said job description that we have with our clients. Hope you would be interested. Please forward you updated detailed resume. If you are not available, I would really appreciate if you could please refer me your friend or a colleague. TITLE: PHP/XML/SQL DEVELOPER TYPE: CONTRACT DURATION: 6+ months CITY: TORONTO
DESCRIPTION: Experience level is 4-5 years plus
EXPERIENCE: Must have experience in PHP XML Web design & development Unix Datebase: Oracle, SQL Experience with Unix file structures -- both flat files and xml structures. Banking Experince and Web Application experience is must.
NOTES: * Please ignore this email if you do not fit into this position. Your resume was picked up on the skills keywords search. As a result you have received this email. We regret inconvenience. * When you reply, please put the job title in the subject line. * If you do not have an up dated resume with us, please attach one to your reply. * If you know anyone else who may be interested have them send a resume to me.
Please monitor our web site for other job/contract openings at http://www.tdm.ca/
Thank You
Recruiter: KETAN PATEL
300-3 Church St. Toronto Ontario M5E 1M2 Canada TDM@TDMTECH.COM WWW.TDMTECH.COM TEL: 416-777-0007 FAX: 416-777-1117
post.title: PHP/XML/SQL DEVELOPER (Contract)
